reviewText:
Played perfectly on my USA Oppo multi-region Blu-ray player.

The movie will start in Spanish, just press the language button on your remote control and a pop-up will appear on screen and allow you to select English.

The movie was originally shot in English, and you will be bypassing the dubbed Spanish.

A wonderful pre-code movie. Highly recommend.

The movie was shipped promptly by DaaVeeDee.  Arriving in about 3 days.
